PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk (“ASLC”): PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari (Autopedia) Tbk consists of various automotive-related business fields. Starting with car and motorcycle auctions, moving on to online car buying and selling, and providing data on car and motorcycle prices. Autopedia will continue to grow with addition of more services in the future.

PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk (“ASLC”), part of ASSA Group, engages in the automotive sector with businesses ranging from car and motorcycle auctions, online car buying and selling, and as a data provider for car and motorcycle prices.
 
 Autopedia’s automotive auction business is managed by its Subsidiary, PT JBA Indonesia (JBA), one of the biggest vehicle auctions in Indonesia. On average, JBAI serves more than 100,000 customers annually and consistently maintains 40% of market share. Additionally, Autopedia has launched a brand called CAROLINE.id, a platform for online and offline (O2O) car buying and selling catered to retail customers.

 Innovation is the key for Autopedia in building the a complete car buying and selling ecosystem, and thus the Company created CARTALOG, the only website which provides information on vehicle prices in Indonesia. This site is equipped with Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology that provides reliable information.

 In accordance with Autopedia's vision, which is to become the most trusted omni channel marketplace for automotive, Autopedia will continue to build an ecosystem for buying and selling used vehicles both online and offline for all consumer segments, whether corporate, small businesses or individuals.
Menjadi omnichannel automotive marketpla: To become the most trusted Omni Channel automotive marketplace.
Mendedikasikan diri dan berkomitmen untu: We dedicate ourselves in maximizing & serving customers through application of technology, excellent financial management and reliable management team.
Perseroan didirikan tanggal 18 November: The Company was established on November 18, 2013, as PT Adi Sarana Lelang (ASL).
Mendirikan lelang mobil (car auction) Bi: Established the car auction BidWin at Tipar Cakung, Jakarta.
ASL mengakuisisi 51% saham JBA, pemain d: ASL acquired 51% of JBA’s shares, a local vehicle auction, which then merged within BidWin and became JBA Indonesia.
JBA telah melelang lebih dari 103.269 mo: JBA has sold 103,269 cars and 81.373 motorcycles through auction since 2011.
JBA memiliki lebih dari 100.000 pelangga: JBA has more than 100,000 customers with potential buying powers across Indonesia. Every week, JBA served more than 1,500 people at the auction.
Jaringan lelang JBA tersedia di lebih da: JBA’s network spreads across major cities in Indonesia through 18 branches, hubs, and pools.
ASL berganti nama menjadi PT Autopedia S: ASL changed its name to PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari and became an automotive company with various fields of business including vehicle auction, vehicle sales and purchases, and vehicle information website provider.
Autopedia mengembangkan layanan jual bel: Autopedia has developed a car buying and selling service through the “CAROLINE” brand, and a vehicle price information website called “CARTALOG”.
PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari menambah por: PT Autopedia Sukses Lestari increased its ownership of PT JBA Indonesia to 84.4%. The additional shares are in connection with Autopedia’s objective to improve its business and as a part of building an ecosystem of integrated used car sales.
Melakukan Penawaran Umum Saham Perdana d: Conducted an Initial Public Offering and listed its shares on the Indonesia Stock Exchange.
Logo Autopedia terinspirasi oleh simbol: The Autopedia logo is inspired by the “Fast Forward” symbol or acceleration, which describes Autopedia as a technology based company that prioritizes speed in adopting the relevant and best technology, becoming a visionary amidst all future business trend to become the trusted Omni Channel automotive marketplace.
Aspek dinamis pada logo Autopedia yakni: Autopedia’s logo is also dynamic as it can be read as an “A”, while on the other hand can also be seen as “P”, representing Autopedia’s capability to meet with the everchanging customer’s needs and demand along with the development of the times.
Ide lain yang direpresentasikan logo ini: This logo also represents other ideas such as growth, movement, and speed.
Penggunaan warna biru dalam logo melamba: The blue color in this logo represents the reliability, expertise, and Autopedia’s commitment to provide a transparent service and added value for the customers.
Dalam menjalankan kegiatan usaha, Autope: When conducting business, Autopedia puts a high value on credibility and integrity and acts responsibly.
Menyediakan informasi yang transparan me: Our coure value is to deliver the best service by providing transparent information.
Dalam membangun rumusan tata kelola peru: By developing the best formula for good corporate governance, we ensure that businesses can operate in accordance with government policies to fully support Autopedia's growth.
Temukan informasi terbaru dari laporan d: Find the newest information from Autopedia's financial reports, overviews, and performance.
Autopedia terus berkomitmen dan menjaga: Autopedia remains consistently committed to practicing good corporate governance.
Ada banyak alasan untuk kamu bergabung d: There are many reasons for you to join and be a part of #LifeAtAutopedia. We always provides opportunities for employees to grow and develop their skills. Career development, work/life balance, fun and collaborative work environtment? It’s on Autopedia!
pekerjaan di semua kategori di semua jen: jobs in all categories across all job types and job locations.

Website ini dimiliki dan dikontrol oleh:
This website is owned and controlled by PT. Autopedia Sukses Lestari Tbk. Registered in the Republic of Indonesia, hereinafter referred to as “Autopedia” or also called “We”. In this privacy policy, We help You to understand the usefulness of your personal data that We have collected.
 The information we have received in the form of name, e-mail address, and telephone number is used to fulfill requests, inquiries or cooperation needs for services and/or other business needs. We do not sell or provide available information to other parties without your consent.
 This Privacy Policy only covers information obtained through this website and does not cover information that is likely to be obtained through software downloaded from the site or obtained from other sites linked to this site.
Kami menyimpan informasi dari data priba:
We store information from your personal data including your name, phone number, or e-mail address. We also collect non-personally identifiable information, which may be linked to your personal data, including your IP address, as well as your associated search preferences on specific searches.
 We will use the data to process your needs and answer questions and fulfill your service requests.
Seluruh informasi yang terkumpul dilindu: All collected information is protected through reasonable security measures and procedures to prevent unauthorized access and use of data. Our Partners and third party service providers have committed to managing information in accordance with Our requirements for security and privacy in accordance with applicable provisions in the laws and regulations of the Republic of Indonesia.
Cookie adalah berkas berisi sejumlah inf:
A cookie is a file containing a small amount of information that is placed in the browser of your computer or mobile device. With cookies, Our website may remember your actions and preferences from time to time.
 We use cookies to learn how You interact with Our content and to tailor Our products, services and websites according to Your interests and needs. Cookies also function to collect your behavioral data on Our website to serve targeted advertisements on third party websites in order to remind and remarket Our products and services to You.
 On most websites, acceptance of cookies is set automatically. You can choose to refuse or block cookies based on Your visit to Our site by changing Your browser settings so that you receive a warning before certain cookies are stored, select certain cookies from third parties or by cookies by deleting cookies that are already stored.
Situs Kami dapat menyediakan tautan menu: Our Site may provide links to other websites or other applications. If you submit personal information to these sites, your information is governed by their privacy policies and is not entirely our responsibility.
Kami dapat memperbaharui kebijakan priva: We may update this privacy policy from time to time and you are advised to check this page from time to time. By continuing to use Our site and services, you confirm your agreement to continue using the services for any updates of this Privacy Policy.
Penting bagi Anda meluangkan waktu untuk: It is important that you take the time to read, understand and accept the terms of this privacy policy. If You have any questions about Our handling of personal information, You can write to Us an email at info@autopedia.id
Terima kasih telah menguhubungi Autopedi: Thank you for connecting to Autopedia. We will reply to your messages as soon as possible, check your email regularly.
Laporan anda telah kami terima dan akan: We have received your report and we will handle it witihn 2x24 hours. Thank you for your participation in supervising Autopedia's activities.
Lamaran pekerjaanmu telah diterima. Peri: Your job application has been accepted. Check your email regularly to find out the next process.
Laporkan apabila Anda melihat pelanggara: Report if you see internal party violations such as corruption, abuse of authority, unlawful acts, violations of the code of ethics, company policies and regulations, conflicts of interest, financial or non-financial (company good name) and violations of K3 (Occupational Safety Health).
Informasikan penjelasan tindakan, lampir: Inform an explanation of the action, attach supporting evidence and include your identity data.
Pelanggaran Kode Etik: Violation of the Code of Conduct
